name: Aesthir Glider
text: Flying\nAesthir Glider can't block.
flavor: "Sacrilege A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death"\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Aesthir Glider
text: Flying\nAesthir Glider can't block.
flavor: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel."\n—Arcum Dagsson,\nSoldevi Machinist

name: Agent of Stromgald
text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
flavor: "The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Agent of Stromgald
text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
flavor: "The ‘fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought."\n—General Varchild

name: Arcane Denial
text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nYou draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Arcane Denial
text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nYou draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Ashnod's Cylix
text: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of his or her library, puts one of them back on top of his or her library, then exiles the rest.
flavor: Few remember that Ashnod's defilement of Terisiare's resources outstripped even that of her peers.

name: Astrolabe
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Astrolabe
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Awesome Presence
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
flavor: "At the core of all power is raw passion."Gerda Äagesdotter,\nArchmage of the Unseen

name: Awesome Presence
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
flavor: "I shape my weapons from the fears of my enemies."\n—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Balduvian Dead
text: {2}{R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Balduvian Horde
text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
flavor: "Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Balduvian Trading Post
text: If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {C}{R} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

name: Balduvian War-Makers
text: Haste\nRampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor: "Those mewling Barbarians will cower before my righteous steel!"\n—General Varchild

name: Balduvian War-Makers
text: Haste\nRampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor: "We send our best to battle, but every man, woman, and child will stand against Varchild's butchers." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Benthic Explorers
text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
flavor: Distant Atlantis charged these Explorers with the task of venturing into unknown waters to track the despised Viscerids.

name: Benthic Explorers
text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
flavor: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

name: Bestial Fury
text: Enchant creature\nWhen Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nWhenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Bestial Fury
text: Enchant creature\nWhen Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nWhenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Bounty of the Hunt
text: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost.\nDistribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

name: Browse
text: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.
flavor: "Once great literature—now great litter."\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Burnout
text: Counter target instant spell if it's blue.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "GOTCHA!"\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Carrier Pigeons
text: Flying\nWhen Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "It's true I ask no fealty of the flocks—but surely we are more than mere beasts." —King Darien of Kjeldor, in a missive to General Varchild

name: Carrier Pigeons
text: Flying\nWhen Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Birds know no borders! Why, then, should we?"\n—General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Casting of Bones
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor: "Only a necromancer would create such a foul form of divination."\n—Gerda Äagesdotter,\nArchmage of the Unseen

name: Casting of Bones
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor: "Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes."\n—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Chaos Harlequin
text: {R}: Exile the top card of your library. If that card is a land card, Chaos Harlequin gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Otherwise, Chaos Harlequin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Contagion
text: You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.\nDistribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

name: Deadly Insect
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "Beautiful, indeed—but one sting could fell a Giant in a heartbeat."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko,\nElvish Hunter

name: Deadly Insect
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting."\n—Jaeuhl Carthalion,\nJuniper Order Advocate

name: Death Spark
text: Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

name: Diminishing Returns
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

name: Diseased Vermin
text: Whenever Diseased Vermin deals combat damage to a player, put an infection counter on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, Diseased Vermin deals X damage to target opponent previously dealt damage by it, where X is the number of infection counters on it.

name: Dystopia
text: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

name: Elvish Bard
text: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor: "How can any Human hope to match our skills? We are children of Fyndhorn, and its sap runs in our veins."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko,\nElvish Hunter

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor: "No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Elvish Spirit Guide
text: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Energy Arc
text: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
flavor: "Relent, and you may transcend your situation."\n—Gerda Äagesdotter,\nArchmage of the Unseen

name: Enslaved Scout
text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor: "Her soldiers' hatred for the Goblins is tempered only by their need for what the Goblins alone hold: knowledge of their mountain home."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Enslaved Scout
text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor: "Even the basest creatures may serve a purpose. Still, their lives need be only as long as the paths we tread."\n—General Varchild

name: Errand of Duty
text: Put a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding onto the battlefield. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "May they speed to their task, for the Skyknights alone cannot hold Kjeldor safe."\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Errand of Duty
text: Put a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding onto the battlefield. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant"\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Exile
text: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

name: False Demise
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "Fool Never believe they're dead until you see the body"\n—General Varchild

name: False Demise
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "Far too many of our missing ‘dead' seem to be turning up in Varchild's ranks"\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Fatal Lore
text: An opponent chooses one —\n• You draw three cards.\n• You destroy up to two target creatures that player controls. They can't be regenerated. That player draws up to three cards.
flavor: "All knowledge has its price."\n—Gerda Äagesdotter,\nArchmage of the Unseen

name: Feast or Famine
text: Choose one —\n• Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.\n• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The living cannot understand the benefits of death."\n—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Feast or Famine
text: Choose one —\n• Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.\n• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Fevered Strength
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health."\n—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Fevered Strength
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "The fever clouds the mind as it energizes the body. Both will pass in time."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Floodwater Dam
text: {X}{X}{1}, {T}: Tap X target lands.
flavor: Viscerid dams may be of living creatures as well as bones and mud.

name: Force of Will
text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.\nCounter target spell.

name: Foresight
text: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Foresight
text: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Fyndhorn Druid
text: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.
flavor: "Honor those who honor Fyndhorn above themselves."\n—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Fyndhorn Druid
text: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.
flavor: "All struggles ultimately require sacrifice. It's just that some sacrifices are dearer than others."\n—Jaeuhl Carthalion,\nJuniper Order Advocate

name: Gargantuan Gorilla
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a Forest. If you sacrifice a snow Forest this way, Gargantuan Gorilla gains trample until end of turn. If you don't sacrifice a Forest, sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla and it deals 7 damage to you.\n{T}: Gargantuan Gorilla deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Gargantuan Gorilla.

name: Gift of the Woods
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

name: Gift of the Woods
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

name: Gorilla Berserkers
text: Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)\nGorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
flavor: "Their fury is their greatest weapon."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Gorilla Berserkers
text: Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)\nGorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
flavor:
"Beneath serenity may lie
 a hidden rage."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion,
Juniper Order Advocate

name: Gorilla Chieftain
text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
flavor: "In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Gorilla Chieftain
text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
flavor: "Oh, no—not you again?"\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Gorilla Shaman
text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with converted mana cost X.
flavor: "Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals."\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Gorilla Shaman
text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with converted mana cost X.
flavor: "Each generation teaches the next that artifice is the enemy of natural order."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Gorilla War Cry
text: Cast Gorilla War Cry only during combat before blockers are declared.\nAll creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "The only ‘art' these beasts possess is the art of noise!" —Jaya Ballard

name: Gorilla War Cry
text: Cast Gorilla War Cry only during combat before blockers are declared.\nAll creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Theirs is the art of blood." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Guerrilla Tactics
text: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nWhen a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

name: Guerrilla Tactics
text: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nWhen a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

name: Gustha's Scepter
text: {T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled.\n{T}: Return a card you own exiled with Gustha's Scepter to your hand.\nWhen you lose control of Gustha's Scepter, put all cards exiled with Gustha's Scepter into their owner's graveyard.

name: Hail Storm
text: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.
flavor: "If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Heart of Yavimaya
text: If Heart of Yavimaya would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Forest instead. If you do, put Heart of Yavimaya onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Helm of Obedience
text: {X}, {T}: Target opponent puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until a creature card or X cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

name: Inheritance
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "More than lessons may be gained from the past."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Insidious Bookworms
text: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

name: Insidious Bookworms
text: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

name: Ivory Gargoyle
text: Flying\nWhen Ivory Gargoyle dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step.\n{4}{W}: Exile Ivory Gargoyle.

name: Juniper Order Advocate
text: As long as Juniper Order Advocate is untapped, green creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human."\n—Jaeuhl Carthalion,\nJuniper Order Advocate

name: Kaysa
text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

name: Keeper of Tresserhorn
text: Whenever Keeper of Tresserhorn attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 2 life.

name: Kjeldoran Escort
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "The first caravan has passed safely through the Karplusan Mountains without incident, forging a trade route to Balduvia. Kjeld himself would never have believed it"\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Kjeldoran Escort
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Kjeldoran Home Guard
text: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and put a 0/1 white Deserter creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Kjeldoran Outpost
text: If Kjeldoran Outpost would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Plains instead. If you do, put Kjeldoran Outpost onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\n{1}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Kjeldoran Pride
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+2.\n{2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

name: Kjeldoran Pride
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+2.\n{2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

name: Krovikan Horror
text: At the beginning of the end step, if Krovikan Horror is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may return Krovikan Horror to your hand.\n{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Krovikan Horror deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Krovikan Plague
text: Enchant non-Wall creature you control\nWhen Krovikan Plague enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nTap enchanted creature: Krovikan Plague deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Put a -0/-1 counter on enchanted creature. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.

name: Lake of the Dead
text: If Lake of the Dead would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Swamp instead. If you do, put Lake of the Dead onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.\n{T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Lat-Nam has bequeathed us its secrets. With them we shall attain true enlightenment." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Library of Lat-Nam
text: An opponent chooses one —\n• You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\n• You search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
text: First strike\n{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
flavor: "Death does not prevent us from service to our absent master. As long as Tresserhorn stands, so shall we."\n—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
text: First strike\n{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
flavor: "The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Lim-Dûl's Paladin
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you don't, sacrifice Lim-Dûl's Paladin and draw a card.
Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin becomes blocked, it gets +6/+3 until end of turn.
Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage to defending player this turn and that player loses 4 life.

name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

name: Lodestone Bauble
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Lord of Tresserhorn
text: When Lord of Tresserhorn enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life, you sacrifice two creatures, and target opponent draws two cards.\n{B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.

name: Martyrdom
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
flavor: "Martyrs are cheaper than mercenaries, and a far better investment."\n—General Varchild

name: Martyrdom
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
flavor: "The only true immortality is in dying for a cause."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Misfortune
text: An opponent chooses one —\n• You put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life.\n• You put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and Misfortune deals 4 damage to him or her.

name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: The very ground yielded to Mishra's wishes.

name: Misinformation
text: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order.
flavor: "When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Mystic Compass
text: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "And I say north is where I want it to be!"\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Nature's Blessing
text: {G}{W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "Be open to the blessings, whatever their form."\n —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Nature's Chosen
text: Enchant creature you control\n{0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.\nTap enchanted creature: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is white and is untapped and only once each turn.

name: Nature's Wrath
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}.\nWhenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices an Island or blue permanent.\nWhenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent.

name: Noble Steeds
text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "They are fighters as fine as any Knight they carry."\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Noble Steeds
text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Omen of Fire
text: Return all Islands to their owners' hands.\nEach player sacrifices a Plains or a white permanent for each white permanent he or she controls.
flavor: "Let Balduvia burn to warm Kjeldor's hearth!"\n—General Varchild

name: Phantasmal Fiend
text: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.\n{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Phantasmal Fiend
text: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.\n{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Phantasmal Sphere
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it.\nWhen Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, target opponent puts an X/X blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.

name: Phelddagrif
text: {G}: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token onto the battlefield.\n{W}: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.\n{U}: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.

name: Phyrexian Boon
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
flavor: "Dagsson should have paid attention to the lessons of Phyrexia before attempting to create a mechanical utopia."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Phyrexian Boon
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
flavor: "Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."\n—Gerda Äagesdotter,\nArchmage of the Unseen

name: Phyrexian Devourer
text: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it.\nExile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

name: Phyrexian Portal
text: {3}: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

name: Phyrexian War Beast
text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: "Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them."\n—Arcum Dagsson,\nSoldevi Machinist

name: Phyrexian War Beast
text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: "Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Pillage
text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Primitive Justice
text: As an additional cost to cast Primitive Justice, you may pay {1}{R} and/or {1}{G} any number of times.\nDestroy target artifact. For each additional {1}{R} you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional {1}{G} you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

name: Pyrokinesis
text: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.\nPyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
flavor: "Anybody want some . . . toast?"\n—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Reinforcements
text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: "We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Reinforcements
text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: "Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."\n—General Varchild

name: Reprisal
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Reprisal
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Ritual of the Machine
text: As an additional cost to cast Ritual of the Machine, sacrifice a creature.\nGain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
flavor: "Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Rogue Skycaptain
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a wage counter on Rogue Skycaptain. You may pay {2} for each wage counter on it. If you don't, remove all wage counters from Rogue Skycaptain and an opponent gains control of it.

name: Royal Decree
text: Cumulative upkeep {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nWhenever a Swamp, Mountain, black permanent, or red permanent becomes tapped, Royal Decree deals 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

name: Royal Herbalist
text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
flavor: "It's not so easy anymore. Nothing grows in Kjeldor but seaweed."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Royal Herbalist
text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
flavor: "Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Scarab of the Unseen
text: {T}, Sacrifice Scarab of the Unseen: Return all Auras attached to target permanent you own to their owners' hands. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Scars of the Veteran
text: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Scars of the Veteran's mana cost.\nPrevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

name: School of the Unseen
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: After the terrible retribution visited upon Lat-Nam, this school of mages chose to hide from the eyes of the world.

name: Seasoned Tactician
text: {3}, Exile the top four cards of your library: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: "The benefits of peace far outweigh the pride of Generals."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Sheltered Valley
text: If Sheltered Valley would enter the battlefield, instead sacrifice each other permanent named Sheltered Valley you control, then put Sheltered Valley onto the battlefield.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or fewer lands, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

name: Shield Sphere
text: Defender\nWhenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.
flavor: "My Soldiers know that they need never fear for their protection."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Sol Grail
text: As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color.\n{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
flavor: "Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Soldevi Adnate
text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
flavor: "People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Adnate
text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
flavor: "An idiot cannot hear sense, even when a thousand people speak it."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Digger
text: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
flavor: "This ceaseless device has helped uncover marvels unreachable by mere flesh."\n—Arcum Dagsson,\nSoldevi Machinist

name: Soldevi Excavations
text: If Soldevi Excavations would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Island instead. If you do, put Soldevi Excavations onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {C}{U} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Soldevi Heretic
text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
flavor: "It cannot be Soldev crushed, and my machines to blame?"\n—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Soldevi Heretic
text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
flavor: "In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Sage
text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor: "Our underground archives grow daily, as our excavators and sages alike dig to uncover hidden wonders."\n—Arcum Dagsson,\nSoldevi Machinist

name: Soldevi Sage
text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor: "To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Sentry
text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
flavor: "Our newfound security enables us to turn more of our attentions to the wonders that lie deep within the soil."\n—Arcum Dagsson,\nSoldevi Machinist

name: Soldevi Sentry
text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
flavor: "A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Steam Beast
text: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life.\n{2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.
flavor: "Dagsson saw the steam as life-giving—until his followers felt its scalding touch."\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Steam Beast
text: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life.\n{2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.
flavor: "Nothing has ever broken my heart so much as this—the betrayal of Soldev by my beloved machines"Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: {R}, {T}: Target player shuffles his or her library.
flavor: "Loyalty to coin alone is loyalty nonetheless."\n—General Varchild

name: Spiny Starfish
text: {U}: Regenerate Spiny Starfish.\nAt the beginning of each end step, if Spiny Starfish regenerated this turn, put a 0/1 blue Starfish creature token onto the battlefield for each time it regenerated this turn.

name: Splintering Wind
text: {2}{G}: Splintering Wind deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Splinter creature token onto the battlefield. It has flying and "Cumulative upkeep {G}." When it leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and each creature you control. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

name: Stench of Decay
text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "My lord, there is only so much I can do. This plague infests Krov worse than any other city."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Stench of Decay
text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence."\n—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Storm Cauldron
text: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.\nWhenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Storm Crow
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: "It tells you that the worst is coming. Do you listen?\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Storm Crow
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: "Watch for it Right on its tailfeathers will be a storm from your nightmares."\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Storm Elemental
text: Flying\n{U}, Exile the top card of your library: Tap target creature with flying.\n{U}, Exile the top card of your library: If the exiled card is a snow land, Storm Elemental gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Storm Shaman
text: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Embrace the storm. Its voice shall echo within you, and its fire shall become your touch"\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Storm Shaman
text: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Let the lightning be your warning, and the thunder your battle cry."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes,\nBalduvian Chieftain

name: Stromgald Spy
text: Whenever Stromgald Spy attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player play with his or her hand revealed for as long as Stromgald Spy remains on the battlefield. If you do, Stromgald Spy assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Suffocation
text: Cast Suffocation only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell.\nSuffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Surge of Strength
text: As an additional cost to cast Surge of Strength, discard a red or green card.\nTarget creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Sustaining Spirit
text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nDamage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
flavor: "Faith is our greatest protector."\n—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Swamp Mosquito
text: Flying\nWhenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Swamp Mosquito
text: Flying\nWhenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Sworn Defender
text: {1}: Sworn Defender's power becomes the toughness of target creature blocking or being blocked by Sworn Defender minus 1 until end of turn, and Sworn Defender's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of that creature until end of turn.

name: Taste of Paradise
text: As an additional cost to cast Taste of Paradise, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times.\nYou gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.
flavor: "There is, in each of us, the potential to heal and the gift of renewed life."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Taste of Paradise
text: As an additional cost to cast Taste of Paradise, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times.\nYou gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.
flavor: "Any who drink of Freyalise's bounty drink the mead of rebirth."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Thawing Glaciers
text: Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped.\n{1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

name: Thought Lash
text: Cumulative upkeep—Exile the top card of your library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nWhen a player doesn't pay Thought Lash's cumulative upkeep, that player exiles all cards from his or her library.\nExile the top card of your library: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

name: Tidal Control
text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nPay 2 life or {2}: Counter target red or green spell. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Tornado
text: Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\n{2}{G}, Pay 3 life for each velocity counter on Tornado: Destroy target permanent and put a velocity counter on Tornado. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Undergrowth
text: As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}.\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.
flavor: "It is the work of sorcery. Burn it!" —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Undergrowth
text: As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}.\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.
flavor: "The art of war is turning obstacle to advantage." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Unlikely Alliance
text: {1}{W}: Target nonattacking, nonblocking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Strange alliances are alliances still, and provide the same protection."\n—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Urza's Engine
text: Trample\n{3}: Urza's Engine gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)\n{3}: Attacking creatures banded with Urza's Engine gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "Humans and machines working together can be fearsome indeed!" —Arcum Dagsson

name: Varchild's Crusader
text: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "Every patch of land must belong to Kjeldor, no matter what the cost!"\n—General Varchild

name: Varchild's Crusader
text: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "We could have peace, but Varchild would rather have the maps of the new Kjeldor drawn in Balduvian blood." —King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Varchild's War-Riders
text: Cumulative upkeep—Have an opponent put a 1/1 red Survivor creature token onto the battlefield. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nTrample; rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor: "What tries to crush our spirit only strengthens our resolve." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Veteran's Voice
text: Enchant creature you control\nTap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.
flavor: "Teach by example. If your students do not survive, they were not worth the lesson."\n—General Varchild

name: Veteran's Voice
text: Enchant creature you control\nTap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.
flavor: "Good soldiers rely first upon their training, then upon their instincts." —King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Viscerid Armor
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1.\n{1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.
flavor: One Viscerid's death is often another's gain.

name: Viscerid Armor
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1.\n{1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.
flavor: A fallen Viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

name: Viscerid Drone
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated.\n{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

name: Wandering Mage
text: {W}, Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.\n{U}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target Cleric or Wizard creature this turn.\n{B}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target player this turn.

name: Whip Vine
text: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nYou may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step.\n{T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.

name: Whip Vine
text: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nYou may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step.\n{T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.

name: Whirling Catapult
text: {2}, Exile the top two cards of your library: Whirling Catapult deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
flavor: "Direct confrontation never was to the Orcs' taste."\n—General Varchild

name: Wild Aesthir
text: Flying, first strike\n{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: "What Barbarian secrets do they spy from their lofty perch?"\n—General Varchild

name: Wild Aesthir
text: Flying, first strike\n{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: "High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed."\n—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Winter's Night
text: Whenever a player taps a snow land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Yavimaya Ancients
text: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: "The Ancients teach us that if we can but last, we shall prevail."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Yavimaya Ancients
text: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: "We orphans of Fyndhorn have found no welcome in this alien place."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Yavimaya Ants
text: Trample, haste\nCumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor: "Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."\n—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order
